about_the_game:
Roombattle is a party fighting game where players will control robotic vacuum cleaners and will fight equipped with sharp objects and balloons. The main objective is to be the last to be equipped balloons in the game.

Meet up with your friends, customize your vacuum, win the minigames and get ready to battle in different rooms to claim victory!

This demo includes:

  • Living Room Setting: Three different maps with plenty of interactive elements and obstacles with which to crash your vacuum cleaner. Beware of the cactus!

  • 6 Players vacuum battles

  • 2 Minigames: 

    • Roombout: Don’t let your vacuum cleaner fall into the water, or you will lose! 

    • Balloon Rain: Is it raining, meatballs? No, It’s raining balloons? We’ll have pop them all! 

  • 6 Power Ups: Crazy modifiers to make the matches more chaotic.

  • 2 Mistery Skills: The winner of the minigame will get a perk to make them (almost) invincible. 

  • Customize your vacuum cleaner: Enjoy up to 8000 different combinations to be the best vacuum divaner!

  • Remote Play Together Support

Roombattle is designed for all types of players and can be played with just 2 buttons and a stick. Don’t have a controller? No problem—you can also play using a keyboard!

And if you have more than 4 players, don’t worry—Roombattle supports up to 6 players battle!

This is just a sneak peek of what's coming:

  • Native Online Multiplayer

  • Multiple themes with different levels

  • Mini-games, mini-games, and even more mini-games

  • Different game modes: Party Forever!

  • Customizable unlockables

  • And much more!

name: Roombattle Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750-Ti / AMD RX 550, 2GB VRam
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or similar
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580, 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: You'd never have guessed that vacuum cleaners could break up friendships. Burst the balloons, dominate all the mini-games, and compete with your friends across different themed rooms. Wreck, clean, and claim your victory—in that order.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Catalan, Galician
*languages with full audio support
